snippet.title: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened Remastered
snippet.description: Sherlock Holmes The Awakened Remastered edition offers players a new third-person view vs the original first-person perspective keeping with the traditional Point & Click gameplay style of the original adventure games. Please visit http://www.frogwares.com/ for more info.
